Many women and men suffer in silence when it comes to physical abuse. The shame often associated with being a victim of violence can weigh heavy on one’s mind and heart, with many believing they are truly alone in their struggle. 
A number of celebrities who have suffered through physical abuse have been brave enough to talk about it and share their story of survival — proving that no obstacle can stop you from overcoming and succeeding despite a tumultuous past. 
Here are 21 celebs that have suffered through physical abuse and are stronger now than ever before.
